meanings.definition: causing feelings of embarrassment or awkwardness
meanings.sent1: Her cringeworthiest moment was when she tripped in front of everyone.
meanings.sent2: The talent show had the cringeworthiest performances of all time.
meanings.sent3: His cringeworthiest memory involved a failed magic trick at a party.
meanings.sent4: The cringeworthiest scene in the movie made everyone squirm in their seats.
meanings.sent5: The cringeworthiest jokes at the comedy club fell flat with the audience.

meanings.sent1: It was the cringeworthiest situation she had ever been in.
meanings.sent2: The cringeworthiest part of the speech was when he forgot his lines.
meanings.sent3: The cringeworthiest dance move he attempted left everyone chuckling.
meanings.sent4: The cringeworthiest silence followed his poorly received joke.
meanings.sent5: The cringeworthiest outfit at the party drew many curious glances.

meanings.sent1: His attempt at humor was the cringeworthiest of all.
meanings.sent2: The cringeworthiest part of the play was the awkward love confession.
meanings.sent3: The cringeworthiest karaoke performance of the night was surprisingly entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The cringeworthiest moment of the meeting was when the boss's phone rang loudly.
meanings.sent5: The cringeworthiest comment of the day left everyone speechless.
